skins.shipDescription: Admiral Hipper-class Heavy Cruiser, Admiral Hipper
skins.selfIntroduction: I am Admiral Hipper, the Iron Blood heavy cruiser named after the undefeated Admiral Franz von Hipper. I have participated in countless battles and given them my all. The Barents Sea? That only happened because Admiral Kummetz was even dumber than you.
skins.acquisition: Huh? You are the commander? Is the war effort going so poorly these days that they¡¯re letting anyone become a commander?
skins.login: Idiot, so you rolled out of bed? Haah? What are you fantasizing about? I only happened to bump into you while patrolling the port.
skins.details: What are you looking at, idiot? Get out of my room!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Bl¨¹cher, I will definitely protect you this time.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Hah? A novice like you wants to challenge my cruiser-commanding skills?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Hah? Are the Schweinshaxe and beer ready yet? How many servings do we need? Idiot! Is your brain just an ornament?
skins.secretaryTouch: Huh? Did I give you permission to touch me?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Huh?! You stupid, moronic, block-headed idiot! Go die! Sink yourself in the Kiel Bay right now!
